metadata.name: Kevin Helps Turkey
metadata.description:
100% of the mint from here will be sent to a charity organization in Turkey for the purpose of helping the Turkish people who are victims of the Earthquake Disaster.

An additional donation will be made by the Pixelmon team on top of this mint. 

To give directly send ETH to:  0xe1935271D1993434A1a59fE08f24891Dc5F398Cd
